name: zeldaspeedruns
description: This is the next-generation backend API server for the [ZeldaSpeedRuns](https://www.zeldaspeedruns.com) website, currently in active development and not yet deployed to production. While this software is specifically written for use by ZSR, it is released as free, open-source software licensed under the GPLv3 and may be freely used by anyone who might find use for it.
